EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email Template sent to Recipients when their Application for Announcement is Approved
EmailTemplate.name: Application Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Applications #{!Application__c.Name} has been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Application {!Application__c.Name} has been approved.
This email is to notify you that the Application {!Application__c.Name} for the Funding Opportunity # {!Application__c.Announcement__c} has been Approved.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
